refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Checks whether or not string conforms to the restrictions on the sets of valid characters defined by TLD authorities around the World. Treats string as a hostname if tld is not present, determining the TLD from the hostname. If tld is present, uses the restrictions defined by the parties responsible for TLD tld. charset may be used to specify the character set the string is in. Should an invalid character be detected, returns FALSE and the 0-based position of the offending character in reference errpos. In case of other failure conditions, errpos is not touched, and NULL is returned. Should string conform to the TLD restrictions, TRUE is returned.

tld_check returns TRUE, FALSE or NULL.
An example
<?php echo tld_check('phüpè.se', &$errpos, 'ISO-8859-1'); ?>
